Text:
Your antivirus program may detect a false positive on the keygen.
It is the anti-steal protection AIR use on their cracks.
This is a super upload - many thanks, and I'll seed x 2 at least.
Hey sorry to bother bu I'm a noob at this, how do I authorize it so it's the full version & not a 15 day trial, the nfo file won't open, and I tried that serial number, any help please? Thanks.

Hey musiclad91 here are the instructions :

1) Unzip, Unrar and install
2) Disconnect from Internet
3) Load Plugin and click Authorize 
4) Open Keygen, Click on generate
5) Copy the Serial-number from keygen and paste it into authorization window 
6) Now wait until the "Offline Options" button appears, click it and paste the challenge-code into keygen, then generate response and authorize !

To open NFOs right-click on it, then "Open with" and at the "choose default program" dialog chose wordpad and check the box "always open that kind of file with this program" click okay and you're good to open NFOs !

__IF you have any other problems or don't understand the activation process let me know precisely at which step are you stuck__
Thanks akun91! I did everything you said and it all worked perfectly, thanks for the response and upload.
